sentence.Network_en: We gained a rich supply of data which would normally be inaccessible.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们得到了通常难以获取的大量数据。

sentence.Network_en: The route took us through scenery quite inaccessible to the motorist.
sentence.Network_cn: 这条路线带我们穿越了驾车者难以抵达的风景区。

sentence.Network_en: Parts of the forest are still dense and inaccessible.
sentence.Network_cn: 森林的一些部分仍然很茂密，人迹罕至。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念第三册精解 ... ●commercialization n. 商品化 ●inaccessible adj. 难接近的,达不到的 ●hospitable adj. 不好客的.
新概念第三册精解 ... ●commercialization n. 商品化 ●inaccessible adj. 难接近的,达不到的 ●hospitable adj. 不好客的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... accessible 能接近的；可进去的 inaccessible 难以接近的 succeed 成功；继续.
文都考研词汇词根（1-1000） - 豆丁网 ... access 通路, 访问, 入门 inaccessible 达不到的, 难以接近 successful 成功的.

list.abs: inaccessible number 不可达数inaccessible ordinal 不可达序数inaccuracy 不精密
1. 不可达序数inaccessible number 不可达数inaccuracy 不精密
inaccessible boundary point 不可达边界点inaccessible element 不可达元素inaccessible number 不可达数
in vitro 在体外inaccessible antigen 隐蔽抗原inborn errors of metabolism 先天性代谢缺损，先天性代谢缺陷.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French, or from late Latin inaccessibilis, from in- 'not' + accessibilis (see accessible)

entry.tran: 达不到的;难到达的;不可(或不易)进入的
entry.def: An inaccessible place is very difficult or impossible to reach.

example.ex: ...the remote, inaccessible areas of the Andes rainforests.
example.tran: 偏僻遥远、难以到达的安第斯雨林地区

example.ex: The route took us through scenery quite inaccessible to the motorist.
example.tran: 这条路线带我们穿越了驾车者难以抵达的风景区。

entry.tran: 见不到的;不可使用的;买不到的
entry.def: If something is inaccessible, you are unable to see, use, or buy it.

example.ex: Ninety-five per cent of its magnificent collection will remain inaccessible to the public...
example.tran: 其中 95% 的顶级收藏品仍不会向公众开放。

example.ex: We gained a rich supply of data which would normally be inaccessible.
example.tran: 我们得到了通常难以获取的大量数据。

entry.def: Someone or something that is inaccessible is difficult or impossible to understand or appreciate.

example.ex: A lot of contemporary music is virtually inaccessible.
example.tran: 许多当代音乐几乎难以理解。

example.ex: ...using language that is inaccessible to working people.
example.tran: 使用劳动人民无法理解的语言

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being reached only with great difficulty or not at all

sentences.sentence: "timber is virtually unobtainable in the islands"
"untouchable resources buried deep within the earth"

auth_sentence.content: An internal rescue hoist...for pick ups in inaccessible areas.
auth_sentence.res_content: An internal rescue hoist...for pick ups in inaccessible areas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An internal rescue hoist...for pick ups in inaccessible areas.

auth_sentence.content: Dirty and inaccessible pick-up spots also are a disincentive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dirty and inaccessible pick-up spots also are a disincentive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dirty and inaccessible pick-up spots also are a disincentive.

auth_sentence.content: It is possibly the most inaccessible terrain in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is possibly the most inaccessible terrain in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is possibly the most inaccessible terrain in the world.

access接近+ory表形容词或名词→接近的物→附加物,附属的
excess[n.过度,过剩]+ive……的→adj.过分的;过度的
in不+accessible[adj.能接近的;可进去的]→adj.难以接近的
suc随后+cess行走,前进+ive……的→随后跟上→连续的
access接近+ory表形容词或名词→接近的物→附加物,附属的
an=ante前+cest=cess行走,前进+or人→走在前面的人→祖先
an=ante前+cest=cess行走,前进+ry整体→n.祖先;世系,家世
con共同+cess后退+ion动作或状态→n.让步;退位
ne=need需要+cess行走,前进+ary物→n.必需品

stems_affixes.value_cn: 必要性, 需要,必需品

process[n.过程;进行 v.加工, 处理]+ion表名词→向前走的队伍
re回+cess行走,前进→走回去→休息
re回+cess行走,前进+ion动作或状态→走回去→撤退
suc随后+cess行走,前进→随后跟上→继续→继续做→成功

means.word_mean: 达不到的, 不可及的

sentences.en: The top of Mount Everest is the most inaccessible place in the world.
sentences.cn: 珠穆朗玛峰是世界上最难到达的地方。
